title: When someone challenges you to a 1v1....
body: and you add them and set up the room but they back out....like you just proved everything our altercation was about. And now you basically said I'm right because you challenged me, I called you on your shit, and then you backed out and unfriended completely. Like come on.....you really don't need to be talking shit and not backing it up.

replies.body:
1 v 1 is meaningless, especially online. Don't give in to it, don't provoke it.

1 v 1 is a waste of time for people desperate for attention.

Wait till the replays come out, THEN you can 1 v 1

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Truly I rarely 1v1 but guy wanted to talk shit to me and say i couldn't ever think of beating him in a 1v1 so I called him on it. he basically just dipped out. Now i get it. the dude was unranked and by the mmr they gave him on op.gg he was like B3. i get that I'm S1. Big difference between us two. But hell it's not like I challenged him. I just accepted the metaphorical glove he threw in my face.
but 1v1 is fun and a good way to practice dueling

Lol, do custom howling abyss then 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
